label: ARZ
info_overview: The ARZ Z-Wave roller shutters are intended for mounting onto FAKRO roof windows.
info_inclusion: Press "P" button on the device and hold it for 0.5 sec.
info_exclusion: Press "P" button on the device and hold it for 0.5 sec.
